11 UCT::UCT( double c,
12  const std::vector<
13  std::pair<double, double> >& boundsList,
14  const std::vector<double>& splitAccList_) :
15  splitAccList(splitAccList_)
16 {
17  assert(splitAccList.size() == boundsList.size());
18 
19 
20  vector<unsigned int> splitCountList;
21  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < boundsList.size(); ++i)
22  splitCountList.push_back(0);
23 
24  root = new UCTNode(this, c, boundsList, splitCountList);
25 }
26 
27 
28 UCT::~UCT() { if (root) { delete root; } }

31 // ===========================================================================
32 // Public methods
33 // ===========================================================================
34 vector<double> UCT::run( unsigned int n,
35  vector<pair<double, double> >* armBoundsList)
36 {
37  // Run the UCT
38  while (n-- > 0) { root->drawArm(); }
39 
40 
41  // Find the arm selected by the UCBs:
42  // (1) Drawn most of the time
43  // (2) Best mean score
44  // Stops whenever it reaches a leaf or a uninitialized UCB1.
45  const UCTNode* cur = root;
46  while (!cur->isLeaf()
47  && (cur->getLeft()->getN() > 0)
48  && (cur->getRight()->getN() > 0))
49  {
50  unsigned int lN = cur->getLeft()->getN();
51  unsigned int rN = cur->getRight()->getN();
52  double lMu = cur->getLeft()->getMu();
53  double rMu = cur->getRight()->getMu();
54 
55  if ((lN > rN) || ((lN == rN) && (lMu > rMu)))
56  cur = cur->getLeft();
57 
58  else if ((rN > lN) || ((rN == lN) && (rMu > lMu)))
59  cur = cur->getRight();
60 
61  // tie break
62  else
63  {
64  double f = RandomGen::rand01_Uniform();
65  if (f < 0.5) { cur = cur->getLeft(); }
66  else { cur = cur->getRight(); }
67  }
68  }
69 
70 
71  // Store some extra data
72  if (armBoundsList) { *armBoundsList = cur->getBoundsList(); }
73 
74 
75  // Return the parameters associated to this arm
76  return cur->getMeanSample();
77 }

89 UCT::UCTNode::UCTNode(
90  const UCT* uct_,
91  double c_,
92  const std::vector<std::pair<double, double> >& boundsList_,
93  const std::vector<unsigned int>& splitCountList_) :
94  uct(uct_), c(c_),
95  boundsList(boundsList_),
96  n(0), mu(0.0),
97  splitCountList(splitCountList_), splitC(-1), splitV(-DBL_MAX),
98  left(0), right(0)
99 
100 {
101  assert(uct);
102  assert(!boundsList.empty());
103  assert(splitCountList.size() == boundsList.size());
104 }

107 UCT::UCTNode::~UCTNode()
108 {
109  if (!isLeaf()) { delete left; delete right; }
110 }

113 // ===========================================================================
114 // Public methods
115 // ===========================================================================
116 double UCT::UCTNode::drawArm()
117 {
118  double score;
119 
120 
121  // If the current node is a leaf, try to split it.
122  // If it fails, draw the arm corresponding to the mean sample of this
123  // part of the space
124  if (isLeaf() && !split())
125  {
126  score = uct->drawArm(getMeanSample());
127  update(score);
128 
129  return score;
130  }
131 
132 
133  // Select and draw an arm
134  unsigned int lN = getLeft()->getN();
135  unsigned int rN = getRight()->getN();
136 
137  // Case 1: UCB not initialized (the node has been split now)
138  // ==> flip a coin to choose the UCB arm to be initialized
139  if ((lN == 0) && (rN == 0))
140  {
141  double f = RandomGen::rand01_Uniform();
142  if (f < 0.5)
143  {
144  score = uct->drawArm(getLeft()->getSample());
145  left->update(score);
146  }
147  else
148  {
149  score = uct->drawArm(getRight()->getSample());
150  right->update(score);
151  }
152  }
153 
154 
155  // Case 2: UCB partially initialized
156  // ==> draw the other arm
157  else if (lN == 0)
158  {
159  score = uct->drawArm(left->getSample());
160  left->update(score);
161  }
162  else if (rN == 0)
163  {
164  score = uct->drawArm(right->getSample());
165  right->update(score);
166  }
167 
168 
169  // Case 3: UCB initialized
170  // ==> check the UCB scores to select the UCB arm to draw
171  else
172  {
173  double lUCB1Score = getLUCB1Score();
174  double rUCB1Score = getRUCB1Score();
175 
176  if (lUCB1Score > rUCB1Score) { score = left->drawArm(); }
177  else if (lUCB1Score < rUCB1Score) { score = right->drawArm(); }
178  else // tie break
179  {
180  double f = RandomGen::rand01_Uniform();
181  if (f < 0.5) { score = left->drawArm(); }
182  else { score = right->drawArm(); }
183  }
184  }
185 
186 
187  // Update the UCB
188  update(score);
189 
190 
191  // Return
192  return score;
193 }
194 
195 
196 bool UCT::UCTNode::split()
197 {
198  assert(isLeaf());
199 
200 
201  // Select the parameter which has been used the less
202  vector<unsigned int> tSplitCountList = splitCountList;
203  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < boundsList.size(); ++i)
204  {
205  vector<vector<unsigned int>::const_iterator> minList;
206  minList = utils::search::min<vector<unsigned int> >(
207  tSplitCountList.begin(), tSplitCountList.end());
208 
209  int minI = RandomGen::randIntRange_Uniform(0, (minList.size() - 1));
210  splitC = (minList[minI] - tSplitCountList.begin());
211 
212 
213  // If bounds are too tight, discard this parameter and try
214  // another one
215  double bMin = boundsList[splitC].first;
216  double bMax = boundsList[splitC].second;
217  if ((bMax - bMin) < uct->splitAccList[splitC])
218  {
219  tSplitCountList[splitC] = UINT_MAX;
220  splitC = -1;
221  }
222  else { break; }
223 
224  }
225 
226 
227  // Not able to select a parameter
228  if (splitC == -1) { return false; }
229 
230 
231  // Split the space along the selected parameter
232  splitV = ((boundsList[splitC].first + boundsList[splitC].second) / 2.0);
233 
234 
235  // Create the left node
236  vector<pair<double, double> > lBoundsList = boundsList;
237  vector<unsigned int> lSplitCountList = splitCountList;
238 
239  lBoundsList[splitC].second = splitV;
240  ++lSplitCountList[splitC];
241 
242  left = new UCTNode(uct, c, lBoundsList, lSplitCountList);
243 
244 
245  // Create the right node
246  vector<pair<double, double> > rBoundsList = boundsList;
247  vector<unsigned int> rSplitCountList = splitCountList;
248 
249  rBoundsList[splitC].first = splitV;
250  ++rSplitCountList[splitC];
251 
252  right = new UCTNode(uct, c, rBoundsList, rSplitCountList);
253 
254 
255  // Return
256  return true;
257 }
258 
259 
260 std::vector<double> UCT::UCTNode::getSample() const
261 {
262  // Draw each parameter value within the bounds
263  vector<double> paramList(boundsList.size());
264  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < paramList.size(); ++i)
265  {
266  paramList[i] =
267  RandomGen::randRange_Uniform(
268  boundsList[i].first, boundsList[i].second);
269  }
270 
271  return paramList;
272 }
273 
274 
275 vector<double> UCT::UCTNode::getMeanSample() const
276 {
277  // Retrieve the mean value of each parameter
278  vector<double> paramList(boundsList.size());
279  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < paramList.size(); ++i)
280  paramList[i] = ((boundsList[i].first + boundsList[i].second) / 2.0);
281 
282  return paramList;
283 }

Returns a number in [min; max[ range, following a uniform distribution.
